CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Online Marketplaces}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Customer Satisfaction Score exceed 678 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1974, did the total Customer Satisfaction Score experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total customer satisfaction score between {1973} and {1974} was {smaller} than between {1973} and {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1978, did the total Customer Satisfaction Score experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1973?
NC.A: The change in total customer satisfaction score between {1977} and {1978} was {smaller} than between {1972} and {1973}.
